form.label: IDX - 02 - Index Details & Ingestion Deep Analysis - Dashboard - v1.5.90
form.description: Indexes.conf deep analysis by Indexer Cluster with many filters and important index settings.

search.query: | from lookup:splunk_rest_data_indexes_idx_kv_store_lookup | fields idxcluster_label Splunk_Instance title app coldPath coldPath_maxDataSizeMB coldToFrozenDir coldToFrozenScript currentDBSize currentDBSizeMB datamodel_summary_size datatype frozenTimePeriodInSecs homePath homePath_maxDataSizeMB isInternal maxDataSize maxGlobalDataSizeMB maxGlobalRawDataSizeMB maxHotBuckets maxHotIdleSecs maxHotSpanSecs maxTime maxTotalDataSizeMB maxWarmDBCount minHotIdleSecsBeforeForceRoll minTime quarantineFutureSecs quarantinePastSecs repFactor rotatePeriodInSecs thawedPath throttleCheckPeriod totalEventCount total_bucket_count_avg total_capacity total_raw_size tstatsHomePath disabled updated cold_bucket_size warm_bucket_size | search idxcluster_label="$idxcluster_label$" AND title="*$Index_Name$*" | rename title AS Index_Name | join idxcluster_label Index_Name type=left [ search index=`gmc_summary_index` search_name=splunk_internal_index_license_usage_idx_summary_tracker earliest=-1d@d latest=-0d@d | fields _time idxcluster_label Index_Name License_Usage | stats Sum(License_Usage) AS License_Usage BY _time idxcluster_label Index_Name | fields _time idxcluster_label Index_Name License_Usage ] | `get_instance_roles(Splunk_Instance)` | rex field=homePath "volume:(?<HotWarm_Volume>\w+)" | rex field=coldPath "volume:(?<Cold_Volume>\w+)" | rex field=tstatsHomePath "volume:(?<DM_Volume>\w+)" | eval Time_Diff_Days = round ( (maxTime - minTime) / 60 / 60 / 24, 2 ), Days_Diff_From_Retention = Time_Diff_Days - Retention_Days, "Earliest Event" = strftime ( minTime, "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S" ), "Latest Event" = strftime ( maxTime, "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S" ), coldToFrozenDir = if ( isnull ( coldToFrozenDir ) OR coldToFrozenDir ="", "undefined", coldToFrozenDir ), total_bucket_count_avg = floor(total_bucket_count_avg), cold_bucket_size_MB = cold_bucket_size, warm_bucket_size_MB = warm_bucket_size, datamodel_summary_size_MB = datamodel_summary_size, License_Usage_MB = License_Usage | `gmc_byte2human(License_Usage,3)` | `gmc_byte2human(currentDBSize,3)` | `gmc_mb2human(cold_bucket_size,3)` | `gmc_mb2human(warm_bucket_size,3)` | `gmc_mb2human(datamodel_summary_size,3)` | `secs_2_days(frozenTimePeriodInSecs, Retention_Days)` | `secs_2_days(quarantinePastSecs, Quarantine Past Days)` | `secs_2_days(quarantineFutureSecs, Quarantine Future Days)` | `secs_2_days(maxHotSpanSecs, maxHotSpanSecs)` | `strftime_format(updated)` | fillnull value="0" coldPath_maxDataSizeMB homePath_maxDataSizeMB maxGlobalDataSizeMB maxGlobalRawDataSizeMB maxHotIdleSecs partialServiceMetaPeriod ,License_Usage_MB License_Usage_GB License_Usage_TB currentDBSizeMB datamodel_summary_size_MB datamodel_summary_size_GB datamodel_summary_size_TB warm_bucket_size_MB warm_bucket_size_GB warm_bucket_size_TB total_bucket_count_avg cold_bucket_size_MB cold_bucket_size_GB cold_bucket_size_TB Time_Diff_Days Days_Diff_From_Retention repFactor | fillnull value="3" maxHotBuckets | fillnull value="60" rotatePeriodInSecs | fillnull value="300" maxWarmDBCount | fillnull value="500000" maxTotalDataSizeMB | fillnull value="2592000" quarantineFutureSecs | fillnull value="7776000" maxHotSpanSecs | fillnull value="77760000" quarantinePastSecs | fillnull value="188697600" frozenTimePeriodInSecs | fillnull value="auto" maxDataSize minHotIdleSecsBeforeForceRoll | fillnull value="event" datatype | fillnull value="undefined" | search currentDBSize_$unit_tok7$ >= $currentDBSize$ Splunk_Roles="*$Splunk_Roles$*" coldToFrozenDir="$coldToFrozenDir$" datatype="$datatype$" HotWarm_Volume="$HotWarm_Volume$" Cold_Volume="$Cold_Volume$" DM_Volume="$DM_Volume$" Retention_Days="$Retention_Days$" maxDataSize="$maxDataSize$" coldToFrozenDir="$coldToFrozenDir$" thawedPath="$thawedPath$"tstatsHomePath="$tstatsHomePath$" app="$app$" isInternal="$isInternal$" homePath="*$homePath$*" coldPath="*$coldPath$*" coldPath_maxDataSizeMB="$coldPath_maxDataSizeMB$" homePath_maxDataSizeMB="$homePath_maxDataSizeMB$" maxTotalDataSizeMB="$maxTotalDataSizeMB$" maxWarmDBCount="$maxWarmDBCount$" License_Usage_$unit_tok7$ >= $License_Usage$

index=`gmc_summary_index` search_name=splunk_internal_license_rollover_summary_idx_summary_tracker idxcluster_label="$idxcluster_label$" earliest=$TimeRangePkr2.earliest$ latest=$TimeRangePkr2.latest$ `gmc_comment("BaseSearch: splunk_internal_license_rollover_summary_idx_summary_tracker")` | fields _time search_name idxcluster_label Lic_Pool type Lic_Stack_Size License_Usage | `gmc_byte2human(License_Usage,3)` | `gmc_byte2human(Lic_Stack_Size,3)`

index=`gmc_summary_index` search_name=splunk_internal_index_license_usage_idx_summary_tracker idxcluster_label="$idxcluster_label$" Index_Name="$Index_Name$" Lic_Sourcetype="$Lic_Sourcetype$" | fields _time search_name idxcluster_label Lic_Pool Lic_Pool_Size Lic_Stack_Size type Index_Name Lic_Sourcetype Lic_Source Lic_Host License_Usage | makemv delim=" " Lic_Source | makemv delim=" " Lic_Host | stats Values(Lic_Source) AS Lic_Source Values(Lic_Host) AS Lic_Host Values(Lic_Pool) AS Lic_Pool Latest(Lic_Pool_Size) AS Lic_Pool_Size Latest(License_Usage) AS License_Usage BY _time idxcluster_label Index_Name Lic_Sourcetype | eval Time=strftime(_time,"%A %B %d, %Y") | search Lic_Source="$Lic_Source$" Lic_Host="$Lic_Host$" Lic_Pool_Size="$Lic_Pool_Size$" Lic_Pool="$Lic_Pool$" Time="$Time$" | `gmc_byte2human(License_Usage,$round_tok6$)` | `gmc_byte2human(Lic_Stack_Size,$round_tok6$)` | `gmc_byte2human(Lic_Pool_Size,$round_tok6$)`

index=`gmc_summary_index` search_name="splunk_introspection_volume_size_idx_summary_tracker" idxcluster_label="$idxcluster_label$" | fields _time search_name idxcluster_label host Volume Volume_Path Volume_Capacity Volume_Usage | `gmc_byte2human(Volume_Capacity, 3)` | `gmc_byte2human(Volume_Usage, 3)`

index=`gmc_summary_index` search_name=splunk_introspection_index_size_idx_summary_tracker Index_Name="*$Index_Name$*" idxcluster_label="$idxcluster_label$" `gmc_comment("BaseSearch: splunk_introspection_index_size_idx_summary_tracker")` | fields _time search_name idxcluster_label Index_Name total_size home_bucket_size warm_bucket_size cold_bucket_size datamodel_summary_size | `gmc_byte2human(total_size,3)` | `gmc_byte2human(home_bucket_size,3)` | `gmc_byte2human(warm_bucket_size,3)` | `gmc_byte2human(cold_bucket_size,3)` | `gmc_byte2human(datamodel_summary_size,3)`

panel.title: 01. Index Deep Analysis including Index Size & Yesterday's License Ingestion By Cluster By Index

search.query: | stats count by Retention_Days | sort Retention_Days

| noop | sort 0 - currentDBSize | table idxcluster_label app Index_Name HotWarm_Volume Cold_Volume Retention_Days currentDBSize_$unit_tok7$ License_Usage_$unit_tok7$ warm_bucket_size_$unit_tok7$ cold_bucket_size_$unit_tok7$ datamodel_summary_size_$unit_tok7$ total_bucket_count_avg totalEventCount homePath_maxDataSize$unit_tok7$ coldPath_maxDataSize$unit_tok7$ "Earliest Event" "Latest Event" Time_Diff_Days Days_Diff_From_Retention maxDataSize maxHotBuckets maxWarmDBCount "Quarantine Past Days" "Quarantine Future Days" maxHotSpanSecs Num_Splunk_Instances datatype disabled updated | `rename_indexes_fields` | `rename_license_fields`

| from lookup:splunk_rest_data_index_volumes_idx_kv_store_lookup | stats max(max_size) as max_size max(total_size) as total_size last(volume_path) as volume_path by idxcluster_label title | eval total_size_perc= round(total_size/max_size * 100, 2) | `gmc_mb2human(total_size,$round_tok9$)` | `gmc_mb2human(max_size,$round_tok9$)` | rename total_size As total_size_MB max_size As max_size_MB | table idxcluster_label title volume_path max_size_$unit_tok9$ total_size_$unit_tok9$ total_size_perc | sort - total_size_GB | rename title AS "Volume" volume_path AS Path max_size_GB AS "Capacity (GB)" total_size_GB AS "Used (GB)" max_size_MB AS "Capacity (MB)" total_size_MB AS "Used (MB)" max_size_TB AS "Capacity (TB)" total_size_TB AS "Used (TB)" total_size_perc as "Used %"

panel.title: 03. Splunk Daily Ingestion Forecast Using Splunk Machine Learning Smart Forecasting StateSpaceForecast Algorithm

viz.title: StateSpaceForecast is a forecasting algorithm for time series data in the MLTK. It is based on Kalman filters. The algorithm supports incremental fit. (https://docs.splunk.com/Documentation/MLApp/latest/User/Algorithms#StateSpaceForecast)

search.query: index=`gmc_summary_index` search_name=splunk_internal_license_rollover_summary_idx_summary_tracker idxcluster_label="$idxcluster_label$" earliest=-$earliest$d@d latest=-0d@d | fields _time date_wday idxcluster_label Lic_Pool License_Usage | eval Weekends = If (Match(date_wday, "saturday|sunday"), "1", "0") | bucket Span=1d _time | makecontinuous _time Span=1d | `gmc_byte2mb(License_Usage)` | `gmc_byte2gb(License_Usage)` | `gmc_byte2tb(License_Usage)` | stats Max(License_Usage_$unit_tok5$) As License_Usage_$unit_tok5$ Latest(Weekends) As Weekends By _time idxcluster_label Lic_Pool | stats Sum(eval(round(License_Usage_$unit_tok5$, $round_tok5$))) As License_Usage_$unit_tok5$ Latest(Weekends) As Weekends By _time idxcluster_label | fit StateSpaceForecast $field_to_forecast$ output_metadata=true forecast_k=$forecast_k$ holdback=$holdback$ conf_interval=$conf_interval$ specialdays=$special_days_field$ period=$period$ Into app:license_usage_state_space_forecast_version1 | eval _vars="License_Usage_$unit_tok5$"

panel.title: 04. Commulative License Usage By Cluster Over Time

search.query: | bin _time span=1d | stats latest(License_Usage_$unit_tok4$) AS License_Usage_$unit_tok4$ by _time idxcluster_label Lic_Pool | timechart span=1d FixedRange=f UseNull=f UseOther=f limit=0 Sum(eval(round(License_Usage_$unit_tok4$,$round_tok4$))) As License_Usage_$unit_tok4$ by idxcluster_label | join type=outer _time [ search index=`gmc_summary_index` search_name=splunk_internal_license_rollover_summary_idx_summary_tracker earliest=-30d@d | fields _time idxcluster_label Lic_Stack_Size | `gmc_byte2human(Lic_Stack_Size,3)` | bin _time Span=1d | dedup _time Lic_Stack_Size_$unit_tok4$ | stats sum(Lic_Stack_Size_$unit_tok4$) AS Stack_Size by _time]

panel.title: 05. Top N Highest Index Ingestion By Cluster Over Time

search.query: | `gmc_byte2human(License_Usage,$round_tok6$)` | stats Sum(License_Usage_$unit_tok1$) As License_Usage_$unit_tok1$ By _time idxcluster_label Index_Name | timechart span=1d fixedrange=f usenull=f useother=f limit=0 sum(eval(round(License_Usage_$unit_tok1$, $round_tok1$))) AS License_Usage_$unit_tok1$ by Index_Name where max in top$top_tok2$ | addtotals fieldname="Total License Usage"
| stats count by _time | sort 0 - _time | eval Time=strftime(_time,"%A %B %d, %Y")

| where License_Usage_$unit_tok6$ >= $license_usage_tok1$ | eval Lic_Sourcetype = MvIndex(Lic_Sourcetype,0,$max_sample_count$) | eval Lic_Source = MvIndex(Lic_Source,0,$max_sample_count$) | eval Lic_Host = MvIndex(Lic_Host,0,$max_sample_count$) | table _time Time idxcluster_label Index_Name License_Usage_$unit_tok6$ Lic_Pool_Size_$unit_tok6$ Lic_Sourcetype Lic_Source Lic_Host Lic_Pool | `rename_license_fields` | rename Time As "Ingestion Day" | sort 0 - _time

panel.title: 07. Top 10 Highest Ingestion By Index (Pie Chart)

search.query: | stats sum(License_Usage) as License_Usage by Index_Name | sort 0 - count | head 10

panel.title: 08. Top 10 Highest Ingestion by Sourcetype (Pie Chart)

search.query: | stats sum(License_Usage) as License_Usage by Lic_Sourcetype | sort 0 - count | head 10

panel.title: 09. Top 10 Highest Ingestion by Source (Pie Chart)

search.query: | stats sum(License_Usage) as License_Usage by Lic_Source | sort 0 - count | head 10

panel.title: 10. Top 10 Highest Ingestion by Host (Pie Chart)

search.query: | stats sum(License_Usage) as License_Usage by Lic_Host | sort 0 - count | head 10

panel.title: 11. Top 10 Highest Ingestion by License Pool (Pie Chart)

search.query: | stats sum(License_Usage) as License_Usage by Lic_Pool

panel.title: 12. Volume Usage Over Time By Volume

search.query: | timechart Span=1d FixedRange=f UseNull=f UseOther=f limit=0 Max(eval(round(Volume_Usage_$unit_tok8$, $round_tok8$))) As Volume_Usage_$unit_tok8$ BY Volume

panel.title: 13. Commulative Index Size By Cluster Over Time

search.query: | timechart span=1d FixedRange=f UseNull=f UseOther=f limit=0 sum(eval(round(total_size_$unit_tok3$,$round_tok3$))) AS total_size_$unit_tok3$ by idxcluster_label

panel.title: 14. Top N Largest Indexes By Cluster Over Time

search.query: | search Index_Name!="_*" | bin _time span=1d | stats max(total_size_$unit_tok2$) as total_size_$unit_tok2$ by _time idxcluster_label Index_Name | stats max(total_size_$unit_tok2$) as total_size_$unit_tok2$ by _time Index_Name | timechart span=1d FixedRange=f UseNull=f UseOther=f limit=0 max(eval(round(total_size_$unit_tok2$,$round_tok2$))) as total_size_$unit_tok2$ by Index_Name where max in top$top_tok1$ | rename VALUE_* AS *

panel.title: 15. Dashboard Gen & Tracker Job Run Details

search.query: | tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE latest("Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.dispatch_time2") as dispatch_time latest("Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.total_run_time2") as total_run_time latest("Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.scheduled_time") as scheduled_time latest("Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.info2") as info FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler AND Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.savedsearch_name2 IN ( splunk_rest_cluster_config_idx_kv_store_lookup_gen,splunk_rest_data_indexes_idx_kv_store_lookup_gen,splunk_rest_data_index_volumes_idx_kv_store_lookup_gen,splunk_internal_index_license_usage_idx_summary_tracker,splunk_internal_license_rollover_summary_idx_summary_tracker,splunk_introspection_index_size_idx_summary_tracker,splunk_introspection_volume_size_idx_summary_tracker) AND Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.app2 = "global_monitoring_console" BY Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.savedsearch_name2 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler)` | table savedsearch_name2 scheduled_time dispatch_time info total_run_time | `ustime_format(scheduled_time)` | `ustime_format(dispatch_time)` | rename savedsearch_name2 AS "Job Name" scheduled_time As "Scheduled Time" dispatch_time As "Dispatch Time" info As Status total_run_time As "Run Time"

ol.li: GMC Jobs / GMC Gen Jobs / IDX Tier Gen Jobs / IDX Cluster Configuration Gen Job

GMC Jobs / GMC Gen Jobs / IDX Tier Gen Jobs / IDX Cluster Indexes Volumes Gen Job

GMC Jobs / GMC Tracking Jobs / Track License Usage By Cluster Daily

GMC Jobs / GMC Tracking Jobs / Track Index Volume Size Daily

html.li: StateSpaceForecast is a forecasting algorithm for time series data in the MLTK: State Space Forecast
